title: Bachelor vet Tia Booth announces split from beau Cory Cooper with sexy snap
text:
Tia Booth is once again a single lady as she split from her boyfriend Cory Cooper.

She started dating the steel executive in fall 2018 and went Instagram official in November.

The former Bachelor contestant posed in a revealing black dress for a photo shared to Instagram on Tuesday. She addressed her breakup in the caption.

Splitsville: Tia Booth posted snap in a revealing black dress to Instagram on Tuesday, and addressed her breakup from Cory Cooper, whom she started dating in Fall 2018, in the caption

In the photo—from a shoot she previously posted pictures from earlier this month— Tia, 28, dons a little black dress with revealing cutouts around her chest and waist.

She looks away from the camera while on a tarmac with a small jet and the setting sun behind her.

Her long caption explained her split from Cory and why she felt she had to share with her over 700k followers.

'It’s so wild that I feel the need to share this, but let’s rip off the bandaid,' she began. 'No, I am no longer in a relationship. I am fine. He is fine.'

Doing fine: 'No, I am no longer in a relationship. I am fine. He is fine,' she said ''At this stage of life, we are better as friends. He is a very private person and will freak when he reads this, but I wanted to address it myself'

'At this stage of life, we are better as friends. He is a very private person and will freak when he reads this, but I wanted to address it myself.'

She thanked her fans for 'the continued love and support,' before leaving with a lyrics from Destiny's Child's Survivor.

'I’ll leave you with this quote from Destiny’s Child,' she wrote. '“You know I’m not gon diss you on the Internet, cuz my momma taught me better than that."'

And she ended saying 'Ok bye don’t message us,' accompanied by a peace sign.

No shade here: 'I’ll leave you with this quote from Destiny’s Child,' she wrote. '“You know I’m not gon diss you on the Internet, cuz my momma taught me better than that"'

The Bachelor in Paradise star did say she thinks 'It’s tricky being in the public eye... It’s not so easy for me to share...especially when another person is involved.'

And continued: 'At the same time, I want to be vulnerable and real because it’s humbling that all of you take the time to care about what’s going on in my life-the good and the bad.

The couple were last photographed together on the physiotherapist's social media at the end of August.

Previously on: Fans known Tia from her stint on season 22 of the Bachelor, as she vied for the love of Arie Luyendyk Jr. She went on to appear on Bachelor in Paradise where she rekindled a flame with Colton Underwood

Fans known Tia from her stint on season 22 of the Bachelor, as she vied for the love of Arie Luyendyk Jr.

She went on to appear on Bachelor in Paradise where she rekindled a flame with Colton Underwood.

Their confusing relationship came to light on The Bachelorette, and continued to spin-off, where they dated once again before splitting for good.
description: Tia Booth is once again a single lady as she split from her boyfriend Cory Cooper. She started dating the steel executive in fall 2018 and went Instagram official in November.
